title: The Beginning
description: Note: This was a free, serialized story collected into multiple volumes (intended to be the first of five), still available for download on the author's website.-----------Passion. Vengeance. Redemption. Sacrifice. Destiny.Three girls are thrust together by their shared abilities and the roles they are to play in the nearing apocalypse. They are guided only by the mysterious Michael, whose contempt and dislike of them is clearer than his motivations for saving their lives. With assassins and betrayal at every turn, the Children of the Apocalypse must fight to stay alive while discovering their gifts and respective roles in the approaching final battle.Harder still, however, is knowing who to trust...
author: Skyla Dawn Cameron
